enchantment.clash.lunge.desc: Launch forward after missing a spear stab.
enchantment.clash.sweet_spot.desc: Landing a stab outside of your normal attack range will deal double damage.
enchantment.clash.agility.desc: Perform a small dash in the direction you're moving upon using the item.
enchantment.clash.jab.desc: Stab attacks require no charge time, but inflict slowness after use.
enchantment.clash.butchery.desc: Increased damage against porky entities and adds a chance to drop additional porkchops on kill.
enchantment.clash.rampage.desc: On kill, gain a stacking attack speed boost.
enchantment.clash.retaliation.desc: Upon taking damage, gain a stacking attack damage boost.
enchantment.clash.sailing.desc: Rush forward while charging a swing.
enchantment.clash.executioner.desc: Additional swing damage, but reduces swing size.
enchantment.clash.crushing.desc: Increase stagger duration and decrease stagger speed.
